title: Tbird for Android emails don't send
creator: mozi3
content:
I've used Tbird for PC for years with no problem. A month back, I installed it on my Android, then used the desktop "Export for Mobile" option to recreate all my emails (I have several) on my phone. The setup worked and I receive emails. But realized last week that no one receives emails I send from my phone from my domain emails.

No error messages, no bounces, and email ends up in Sent folder. Plus, bcc'ing myself, I receive them. I double-checked outgoing servers. These match what is on the desktop Tbird.

However, emailing from my gmail account in Tbird on Android works--email received. Just the emails from my domain don't go through.

versions: TB for Android 10.1, Verizon (samsung) android (v 15) set to cellular (vs wifi) for internet, I have emails via my domain on shared hosting service.

See attached image.

Thank you!

title: Thunderbird Android Beta: keyboard covers inputform
creator: Cloudsurfer
content: The keyboard on google pixel 7 covers inputform when writing a mail. I cannot move the view downwards neither help myself by moving the cursor down.
